file_content.text: I know you're working with someone inside the Empire. Give me the traitor's name!
Sorry... I'm not too good with names. I remember faces. Maybe if you show me some holograms....
Aaaaah!
There are nine levels of pain we can inflict. That was level three. Remember it before your next answer.
You're dealing with the supreme commander of the Republic. You want him to talk, you better crank it all the way up.
You call that interrogation?
Please... don't give him any ideas.
Ah, the Republic's secret weapon. I know you were responsible for Lord Loyat's death. For that, you must pay!
Only a sick, sadistic monster could torment a helpless prisoner. Don't you see what Darth Arho has turned you into?
The dark side has twisted you.
Spoken like a dutiful servant of the Jedi Council. You will never defeat us. You lack the stomach to do what is necessary to win!
But where was your mercy when you faced my apprentice? Lord Loyat is dead, and for that, you must pay!
Let's see if you have the guts to stand up to someone who can fight back!
Torture is a tool of cowards!
Ah, the hypocritical code of the Jedi Knight. You condemn our tactics, yet you took the life of my apprentice. And for that, you must suffer!
Lord Loyat wasn't a helpless prisoner. She had a chance to fight back.
That was a fair fight.
And now so do you.
We'll deal with this scum, Commander.
Havoc Squad is here, sir!
Not a moment too soon, Major.
Ah, the noble leader of Havoc Squad. The blood of my apprentice is on your hands. You will pay for Loyat's death!
Step away from Supreme Commander Rans. Now.
Leave him alone.
You killed Lord Loyat! You will pay dearly for taking my apprentice from me!
You abandoned her when she called on you for help.
You don't care about her.
She had to prove herself. She knew the price of failure. Now you will learn the price of defying me!
We have Loyat in custody. She surrendered after you abandoned her.
She's not dead.
No! She would never surrender! She would give her life for me! For your lie, my Minions of Pain will punish you with an agonizing death!
Your apprentice was no match for me. And neither are these pathetic underlings.
She was weak.
It's easy to make threats when you're not even here.
Brave talk for a hologram.
Unlike the Republic, the Empire sees no value in risking our best and brightest to the front lines. That is left to servants and followers.
My Minions of Pain are well-trained in the arts of agony. You will suffer an excruciating death!
This ends now!
You'll pay for that. [Attack]
Destroy them! Let Loyat's defeat be avenged by their screams of torment!
Destroy him! Let Loyat's defeat be avenged by his screams of torment!
Destroy her! Let Loyat's defeat be avenged by her screams of torment!
